price: Olúwa mi, ta mí ní ọrẹ ipò Ànábì. Dà mí pọ̀ mọ́ àwọn ẹni rere.
arabic: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي حُكۡمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbi hab lī ḥuk'man wa-alḥiq'nī bil-ṣāliḥīna
